name: I Hate Flags
description:
This is a small game about you, a cube, that hates flag and have to get as far away from them as possible before time runs out. Why before times run out? Cause arbitrary challenge (as if the controls weren't a challenge enough)

It's a small game made as a part of my education, don't take it seriously, and if you think your exectations are low... well then play this and then we'll talk.

There is also a bug on the main screen. If you press with a mouse, all menu buttons become unpressable... so you know... don't do that. 

Available for Windows only!
